title: Population of Greece 2016 , by gender
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total population for 3 number of Genders.
The Total population is appeared to be the highest at Gender Total and lowest at Gender Males.
The difference of Total population between the highest and lowest Gender is 5559538.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Gender, and Total population in each Gender on the y axis.
The maximum Total population 10783748.0 is found at Gender Total and the minimum is found at Males where Gender is 5224210.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total population for 3 number of Genders.
The Total population is appeared to be the highest at Gender Total and lowest at Gender Males.
The difference of Total population between the highest and lowest Gender is 5559538.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Gender, and Total population in each Gender on the y axis.
The maximum Total population 10783748.0 is found at Gender Total and the minimum is found at Males where Gender is 5224210.0.
The highest Gender Total has 5559538.0 more Total population than the lowest Gender Males.
Considered together, the average Total population in all 3 Genders is roughly 7189165.33.
Summing up the values of all Genders, we get total 21567496.0.
